product_name: Pepper's Molly Polarized Reader Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The Pepper's Molly Polarized Reader sunglasses feature bifocal lenses to reduce glare and give your vision a boost so you don't miss one word of your page-turner while you're lounging in the sun. For close-in vision choose from 1 of these powers: +1.50, +2.00 and +2.50. Polycarbonate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature and are extremely impact resistant. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection.
short_description: The Pepper's Molly Polarized Reader sunglasses feature bifocal lenses to reduce glare and give your vision a boost so you don't miss one word of your page-turner while you're lounging in the sun.
